If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 18 * 19 * Author: Lucas Hernández Abreu 20 * Contact: lucas.hernandez.09@ull.edu.es 21 */ 22 32 #ifndef DOUBLE_PIPE_H 33 #define DOUBLE_PIPE_H 34 #include "../../headers/pipeline.h" 35 #include "../processing_unit_interface.h" 42 class DoublePipe : public ProcessingUnitInterface { 43 public: 44 DoublePipe(); 45 ~DoublePipe(); 46 47 void Start(void** = nullptr); 48 void Run(void*); 49 void Delete(); 50 ProcessingUnitInterface* Clone(); 51 52 private: 53 MemoryManager* sub_mem_manager; 54 Pipeline* sub_pipeline; 55 }; 56 #endif // DOUBLE_PIPE_H
